title: spysweeper_cele
author: spysweeper_cele
content: Hi,I am looking to buy any crypto sportsbetting accounts that have a deficit of over .1BTC (100mbtc). Will be willing to pay 5% of the loss value of it (eg. will buy an account for 5mbtc if the total loss is 100mbtc.Please DM me.Thanks

comments.author: xandry
comments.body: Do you want verified accounts or it doesn't matter?
